A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointing installment to the Star Wars saga. While the pacing\, scene cutting\, unnecessary characters and story arcs\, and questionable plot decisions alone would make this a disappointment\, the worst part by far was the Disney mainstay to inundate every scene with cheap\, crowd-pleasing humor. Not a single moment goes by without an out-of-place joke. Every time a scene draws you in and connects with you\, it kicks you back into reality with some halfhearted attempt at humor.\nThis isn't a \"well\, Empire was poorly reviewed at first\" kind of movie. It's just bad.
